channel.title: How to rig dice 718?
channel.description: Hi guys, on matrix how do i makea command like ;;setroll 100 and then my guy rolls a 100 or setroll 20 and my guy rolls a 20, I wanna troll my friend lol. Also is there a way to make it show up in clan chat only?

item.title: How to rig dice 718?
item.dc:creator: @SprayzZ SprayzZ
item.description:
@SprayzZ wrote:

[quote=“AssassinsCRB, post:3, topic:490605”]I didnt figure it out, what i have so far

case "cheatdice90": player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(17211)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(11900)); chat.sendDiceMessage(player, "Friends Chat channel-mate <col=db3535>Korasi</col> rolled <col=3535>90</col> on the percentile die."); return true;[/quote]

I can help you check your messages.

Read full topic
